block-definition.comment: Reports a three-item list containing the latitude and longitude of the user, and the precision of the measurements. Works only if the user allows snap.berkeley.edu access to location data. Some browsers also require an HTTPS connection to Snap!.

block.l: if (!proc.geostarted) { var geo = navigator.geolocation; var cords = []; var options = { enableHighAccuracy: false, }; function success(pos) { console.log(pos); proc.geocords = [pos.coords.latitude, pos.coords.longitude, pos.coords.accuracy]; } function error(err) { alert("ERROR " + err.code + ": " + err.message); } proc.geostarted = true; proc.geocords = null; console.log("starting geolocation") geo.getCurrentPosition(success, error, options); } else if (proc.geocords) { var cords = proc.geocords; proc.geostarted = null; proc.geocords = null; console.log("returning"); return new List(cords); } else { console.log("yielding"); proc.pushContext('doYield'); proc.pushContext(); }

return listify(JSON.parse(jsonString)); function listify(jsonObject) { if (jsonObject instanceof Array) { return new List(jsonObject.map(function(eachElement) { return listify(eachElement)})); } else if (jsonObject instanceof Object) { return new List(Object.keys(jsonObject).map(function(eachKey) { return new List([eachKey,listify(jsonObject[eachKey])])} )) } else { return jsonObject } }

var response, i, header; if (!proc.httpRequest) { proc.httpRequest = new XMLHttpRequest(); proc.httpRequest.open(method, url, true); proc.assertType(headers, 'list'); if(user != "" && password != "") proc.httpRequest.setRequestHeader('Authorization', 'Basic ' + window.btoa(user+":"+password)); proc.httpRequest.setRequestHeader('X-Requested-With', 'XMLHttpRequest'); for (i = 1; i <= headers.length(); i += 1) { header = headers.at(i); proc.assertType(header, 'list'); proc.httpRequest.setRequestHeader( header.at(1), header.at(2) ); } proc.httpRequest.send(data || null); } else if (proc.httpRequest.readyState === 4) { response = proc.httpRequest.responseText; proc.httpRequest = null; return response; } proc.pushContext('doYield'); proc.pushContext();

block-definition.s: add marker at longitude %'long' latitude %'lat' size %'size' color %'color'

inputs.input: #0000ff blue=#0000ff green=#008000 red=#ff0000 yellow=#ffff00 orange=#ffc300 brown=#a04000 black=#000 white=#fff

block.l: if(document.getElementById("leaflet_div") === null) { alert("Initialize the map first"); } var marker = L.circleMarker([long, lat]); marker.setRadius(size); marker.options.color=color; marker.addTo(markerGroup);

if(document.getElementById("plotly_div") === null) { var sc = document.createElement('script'); sc.setAttribute("type","text/javascript"); sc.setAttribute("src", "/libraries/plotly/plotly.min.js"); document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(sc); } if(document.getElementById("plotly_div") !== null) { var el = document.getElementById("plotly_div"); el.parentNode.removeChild(el); } var d = document.createElement('div'); d.setAttribute("id","plotly_div"); document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0].appendChild(d); stage = this.parentThatIsA(StageMorph); plotlyResize = function(stage) { if(!document.getElementById("plotly_div")) return; var offset = stage.height()+2+stage.parentThatIsA(IDE_Morph).corralBar.height(); if(document.getElementById("leaflet_div") != null && document.getElementById("leaflet_div").style.display != "none") offset += parseInt(document.getElementById("leaflet_div").style.height)+5; document.getElementById("plotly_div").setAttribute("width", stage.width()); document.getElementById("plotly_div").setAttribute("height", stage.height()); document.getElementById("plotly_div").style.width = stage.width()+"px"; document.getElementById("plotly_div").style.height = stage.height()+"px"; document.getElementById("plotly_div").style.position = "absolute"; document.getElementById("plotly_div").style.left = stage.topLeft().x+"px"; document.getElementById("plotly_div").style.top = (stage.topLeft().y+offset)+"px"; document.getElementById("plotly_div").style.display = "block"; document.getElementById("plotly_div").style.backgroundColor = "black"; if(typeof Plotly !== "undefined") { redrawPlot(); }; } plotlyResize(stage); d = document.createElement('div'); d.setAttribute("id","plotly_fsbutton_div"); d.setAttribute("class","leaflet-control-fullscreen") document.getElementById("plotly_div").appendChild(d); d.style.display = "block"; d.style.top = "5px"; d.style.left = "5px"; d.style.position = "absolute"; a = document.createElement('a'); d.appendChild(a); a.style.width = "25px"; a.style.height = "25px"; a.style.display = "block"; a.style.backgroundColor = "#eee"; a.href = "#"; var plotlyFullscreen = false; a.onclick = function() { if(!plotlyFullscreen) { document.getElementById("plotly_div").style.width = "" + window.innerWidth + "px"; document.getElementById("plotly_div").width = window.innerWidth; document.getElementById("plotly_div").style.height = "" + window.innerHeight + "px"; document.getElementById("plotly_div").height = window.innerHeight; document.getElementById("plotly_div").style.left = "0px"; document.getElementById("plotly_div").style.top = "0px"; document.getElementById("plotly_div").style.zIndex = "9999"; document.getElementById("plotly_fsbutton_div").children[0].style.backgroundPosition = "0px -26px"; redrawPlot(); plotlyFullscreen = true; } else { plotlyResize(stage); document.getElementById("plotly_div").style.zIndex = ""; plotlyFullscreen = false; document.getElementById("plotly_fsbutton_div").children[0].style.backgroundPosition = ""; } } myplot = {}; myplot.data = []; myplot.layout = { margin: { l: 30, r: 30, t: 20, b: 30 }, }; myplot.layout.shapes = []; redrawPlot = function() { Plotly.newPlot('plotly_div',myplot.data,myplot.layout, {modeBarButtonsToRemove: ['sendDataToCloud','zoom2d','autoScale2d','toggleSpikelines']}); } inChartBlock = true;
inChartBlock = false; timeout = 0; if(typeof Plotly === "undefined") timeout = 2000; setTimeout(function() { redrawPlot(); }, timeout);
if(list == 0) return false; else return true;

var createVar = function(varName,myself) { if(!myself.isVariableNameInUse(varName)) { myself.addVariable(varName, true); myself.parentThatIsA(IDE_Morph).refreshPalette(); } }; createVar("server",this); createVar("user",this); createVar("password",this);

inputs.input: #0000ff blue=#0000ff green=#008000 red=#ff0000 yellow=#ffff00 orange=#ffc300 brown=#a04000 black=#000 white=#fff

custom-block.s: üó∫ marker: position %s size %n color %txt popup text %txt

block-definition.s: üó∫ marker: position %'geo' size %'size' color %'color' popup text %'text'

inputs.input: #0000ff blue=#0000ff green=#008000 red=#ff0000 yellow=#ffff00 orange=#ffc300 brown=#a04000 black=#000 white=#fff

block.l:
if (document.getElementById("leaflet_div") === null) { var css = document.createElement("link"); css.setAttribute("rel", "stylesheet"); css.setAttribute("href", "/libraries/leaflet/leaflet.css"); document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(css); var sc = document.createElement("script"); sc.setAttribute("type", "text/javascript"); sc.setAttribute("src", "/libraries/leaflet/leaflet.js"); document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(sc); //setTimeout(function() { var css = document.createElement("link"); css.setAttribute("rel", "stylesheet"); css.setAttribute("href", "/libraries/leaflet/leaflet.fullscreen.css"); document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(css); var sc = document.createElement("script"); sc.setAttribute("type", "text/javascript"); sc.setAttribute("src", "/libraries/leaflet/leaflet.fullscreen.min.js"); document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(sc); //}, 750); clusteringLoaded = false; var d = document.createElement("div"); d.setAttribute("id", "leaflet_div"); document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0].appendChild(d); stage = this.parentThatIsA(StageMorph); leafletResize = function(stage) { document.getElementById("leaflet_div").setAttribute("width", stage.width()); document.getElementById("leaflet_div").setAttribute("height", stage.height()); document.getElementById("leaflet_div").style.width = stage.width() + "px"; document.getElementById("leaflet_div").style.height = stage.height() + "px"; document.getElementById("leaflet_div").style.position = "absolute"; document.getElementById("leaflet_div").style.left = stage.topLeft().x + "px"; document.getElementById("leaflet_div").style.top = (stage.topLeft().y + stage.height() + stage.parentThatIsA(IDE_Morph).corralBar.height() + 2) + "px"; document.getElementById("leaflet_div").style.display = "block"; document.getElementById("leaflet_div").style.backgroundColor = "black"; } leafletResize(stage); if (typeof plotlyResize !== "undefined") plotlyResize(stage); function initMap() { if(typeof L == "undefined") { setTimeout(initMap, 500); } else { map = L.map("leaflet_div", { fullscreenControl: { pseudoFullscreen: true } }).setView([0, 0], 1); satelliteLayer = L.tileLayer("https://server.arcgisonline.com/ArcGIS/rest/services/World_Imagery/MapServer/tile/{z}/{y}/{x}", { attribution: "Tiles © Esri — Source: Esri, i-cubed, USDA, USGS, AEX, GeoEye, Getmapping, Aerogrid, IGN, IGP, UPR-EGP, and the GIS User Community" }); streetLayer = L.tileLayer("https://{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png", { attribution: "© OpenStreetMap contributors" }); streetLayer.addTo(map); markerGroup = L.layerGroup().addTo(map); } } initMap(); } function createMarker() { if(typeof L == "undefined") { setTimeout(initMap, 500); return; } timeout = 0; if (typeof markergroup === "undefined") timeout = 2000; coords = geo.split(";"); var marker = L.circleMarker([coords[0], coords[1]]); marker.setRadius(size); marker.options.color = color; var toHtmlList = function(l) { if (typeof l == "undefined") return "null"; if (typeof l.contents == "undefined") return l; var ret = l.contents[0] + ": "; if (typeof l.contents[1] != "undefined" && typeof l.contents[1] == "object") { for (let c in l.contents[1]) ret += c + ","; } else { ret += l.contents[1]; } return ret; } var toHtmlTable = function(tbl) { if (typeof tbl == "undefined" || tbl == null) return "null"; if (typeof tbl.contents == "undefined") return "null"; if (typeof tbl.contents[0] == "undefined") return "null"; // check if 2-dim if (typeof tbl.contents[0].contents == "undefined") return toHtmlList(tbl); var ret = ""; for (let r of tbl.contents) { ret += ""; for (let c of r.contents) { if (typeof c == "null") continue; if (typeof c == "object") { c = toHtmlTable(c); } ret += ""; } ret += ""; } ret += "
" + c + "
"; return ret; } setTimeout(function() { if (text == "") marker.addTo(markerGroup); else { if (typeof text == "object") { var tbl = "
" + toHtmlTable(text) + "
"; marker.addTo(markerGroup).bindPopup(tbl); } else { marker.addTo(markerGroup).bindPopup(text); } } }, timeout) } createMarker();

if(!clusteringLoaded) { var css2 = document.createElement('link'); css2.setAttribute("rel","stylesheet"); css2.setAttribute("href", "/libraries/leaflet/MarkerCluster.css"); var css3 = document.createElement('link'); css3.setAttribute("rel","stylesheet"); css3.setAttribute("href", "/libraries/leaflet/MarkerCluster.default.css"); document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(css3); var sc2 = document.createElement('script'); sc2.setAttribute("type","text/javascript"); sc2.setAttribute("src", "/libraries/leaflet/leaflet.markercluster.js"); document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(sc2); } var time = 0; if(!clusteringLoaded) { clusteringLoaded = true; time = 800; } setTimeout(function() { var markerClusterGroup = L.markerClusterGroup(); markerClusterGroup.addLayers(markerGroup.getLayers()); map.removeLayer(markerGroup); markerGroup = markerClusterGroup; map.addLayer(markerGroup); }, 800);
var markerNormalGroup = L.layerGroup(); for (let l of markerGroup.getLayers()) markerNormalGroup.addLayer(l); map.removeLayer(markerGroup); markerGroup = markerNormalGroup; map.addLayer(markerGroup);
if(document.getElementById("leaflet_div") === null) { alert("Initialize the map first"); } markerGroup.clearLayers();

block-definition.s: üìä bar chart: values %'vals' labels %'labels' name %'name' colors %'colors'

block.l: if(typeof inChartBlock == "undefined" || !inChartBlock) { alert("Chart blocks only work within the \"c-shaped\" chart block!"); return; } values = "" + values; var valuesArray = values.split("‚úù"); if(valuesArray === null || valuesArray == "" || valuesArray.length == 0) { alert("No data defined for plot"); return; } var trace={y:valuesArray,type:type,name:name}; labels = "" + labels; var labelsArray = labels.split("‚úù"); if(labelsArray !== null && labelsArray != "" && labelsArray.length > 0) trace.x = labelsArray; colors = "" + colors; var colorsArray = colors.split("‚úù"); if(colorsArray.length > 0) { trace.marker = {color: []}; for (let col of colorsArray) { trace.marker.color.push(col); } } myplot.data.push(trace);

if(typeof inChartBlock == "undefined" || !inChartBlock) { alert("Chart blocks only work within the \"c-shaped\" chart block!"); return; } s = { type: 'line', xref: 'paper', y0: y, y1: y, x0: 0, x1: 1, line: { } }; if(col != null && col.length > 1) { s.line.color = col; } myplot.layout.shapes.push(s);

block-definition.s: üìä line chart: y values %'vals' name %'name' color: %'col'

block.l: if(typeof inChartBlock == "undefined" || !inChartBlock) { alert("Chart blocks only work within the \"c-shaped\" chart block!"); return; } values = "" + values; var valuesArray = values.split("‚úù"); var trace={y:valuesArray,type:type,name:name}; if(col != null && col.length > 1) { trace.color = col; trace.marker = {}; trace.marker.color = trace.color; } myplot.data.push(trace);

if(typeof inChartBlock == "undefined" || !inChartBlock) { alert("Chart blocks only work within the \"c-shaped\" chart block!"); return; } values = "" + values; var valuesArray = values.split("‚úù"); names = "" + names; var namesArray = names.split("‚úù"); var data = { values:valuesArray, type:type, labels:namesArray, }; myplot.data.push(data);

block-definition.s: üìä bubble chart: x values %'xvals' y values %'yvals' bubble sizes %'sizes'

block.l: if(typeof inChartBlock == "undefined" || !inChartBlock) { alert("Chart blocks only work within the \"c-shaped\" chart block!"); return; } xvals = "" + xvals; yvals = "" + yvals; sizes = "" + sizes; var xArray = xvals.split("‚úù"); var yArray = yvals.split("‚úù"); var sArray = sizes.split("‚úù"); var data = { x:xArray, y:yArray, mode: 'markers', marker: { size: sArray } }; myplot.data.push(data);

block-definition.s: üìä scatter chart: x values %'xvals' y values %'yvals' color %'col'

block.l: if(typeof inChartBlock == "undefined" || !inChartBlock) { alert("Chart blocks only work within the \"c-shaped\" chart block!"); return; } xvals = "" + xvals; yvals = "" + yvals; var xArray = xvals.split("‚úù"); var yArray = yvals.split("‚úù"); var data = { x:xArray, y:yArray, mode: 'markers', type: 'scatter', marker: { color: col } }; myplot.data.push(data);

if(!list.canBeCSV()) { alert("Only two-dimensional lists (tables) can be converted to CSV"); return; } var dl = document.createElement('a'); dl.style.display = 'none'; dl.setAttribute('href', 'data:text/csv;charset=utf-8,' + encodeURIComponent(list.asCSVsem())); dl.setAttribute('download', filename); document.body.appendChild(dl); dl.click(); document.body.removeChild(dl);

array = csv.split('\n').map( row => row.split(';') ).map( row => row.map( str => str.replace(/^\"(.*)\"/, "$1") ) ); maxLen = Math.max.apply(Math, array.map(row => row.length)); array = array.filter(row => row.length == maxLen); return new List(array.map( row => new List(row) ));

if (!proc.fileReaderState) { proc.fileReaderState = 1; proc.file = ""; proc.reader = ""; up = document.createElement("input"); up.setAttribute("type", "file"); up.setAttribute("name", "file"); up.addEventListener('change', function(evt) { if(evt.target.files && evt.target.files.length > 0) { proc.file = evt.target.files[0]; } else { proc.file = "err"; } proc.fileReaderState = 2; }, false); document.body.appendChild(up); up.click(); document.body.removeChild(up); } else if (proc.fileReaderState == 2) { proc.reader = new FileReader(); proc.reader.readAsText(proc.file); proc.fileReaderState = 3; } else if (proc.fileReaderState == 3 && proc.reader.readyState == proc.reader.DONE) { proc.fileReaderState = null; proc.file = null; res = proc.reader.result; proc.reader = null; return res; } proc.pushContext('doYield'); proc.pushContext();
